thread.section_title: DogVacay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DogVacay | dogvacay.com | 3 of 132
thread.title: Holly Kirkendoll

author: Holly Kirkendoll
title: Holly Kirkendoll
text:
Finding DogVacay was a blessed relief from the thought of sending our pups to a kennel. As one of our pups is a rescue, we were so concerned with a kennel because she literally freaks out when something closely resembles that environment. So when I stumbled across this website on the internet, it seemed almost too good to be true!
After looking through the list of potential sitters, we decided upon Lais and Shane. We were then able to do a meet and greet prior to the pups stay to make sure it was a good fit for everyone.
During our trip we received updates on our furbabies several times a day through texts, photos, videos and even FaceTimeðŸ˜‚
It is also affordable! Each sitter sets their own prices and you know, and pay the fee up front. I HIGHLY recommend Lais (our sitter), and this service!!
Oh! And did I mention there's even a user friendly, well integrated app?
LOVE!
